notes.title: Conflicts of Interest
notes.p: H.H. and M.K. own stocks Vactech Ltd., which develops vaccines against picornaviruses. H.H. is the chairman of the Vactech board. H.H. and M.K. also serve on the scientific advisory board of Provention Bio Inc., which is developing an enterovirus vaccine. The other authors have no conflict of interest to declare. The funders had no role in the design of the study; in the collection, analyses, or interpretation of data; in the writing of the manuscript, or in the decision to publish the results.
